timerDuration.name: Timer Duration
timerDuration.hint: Duration in seconds of the timer

critical.name: Critical Threshold
critical.hint: Threshold after which the timer will go critical and start blinking

goNext.name: Go Next
goNext.hint: Go to next combatant when timer ends

critSoundPath.name: Critical Sound
critSoundPath.hint: Sound to play when timer goes critical

endSoundPath.name: End Sound
endSoundPath.hint: Sound to play when timer ends

runForNpc.name: Run for NPC
runForNpc.hint: Run the timer on NPCs turn

showOnUpdateCombatOnly.name: First Show Timer on Next Turn
showOnUpdateCombatOnly.hint: First show the combat timer when 'Begin Combat', 'Next Turn' or 'End Turn' is pressed

secondsInsteadOfPercentage.name: Critical time use seconds instead of percentage
secondsInsteadOfPercentage.hint: By default the critical threshold uses percentage of total time. By checking this setting it's changed to seconds instead.
